newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN LEU 3,302 TO DOLLAR FOR OCT 18-20 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN LEU 3,302 TO DOLLAR FOR OCT 18-20 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate weaker at 3,302 to the dollar for October 18 to 20.
This reference rate was set on Wednesday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Tuesday for October 17 is 3,299 to the dollar. It was 3,286 on Wednesday.
